mapper.select:
SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply , i_u_p_i.user_per_id AS i_user_per_id, i_u_p_i.user_id, i_u_p_i.grade_id, i_u_p_i.per_card_no, i_u_p_i.per_sex, i_u_p_i.per_post, i_u_p_i.per_politics_type, i_u_p_i.per_stu_no, i_u_p_i.per_class_no, i_u_p_i.per_corm_no, i_u_p_i.per_native, i_u_p_i.per_qq, i_u_p_i.per_school_post, i_u_p_i.per_school_honor, i_u_p_i.per_social_practice, i_u_p_i.per_working, i_u_p_i.per_born, i_u_p_i.per_interest, i_u_p_i.per_employ FROM ent_project_info e_p_i LEFT JOIN ent_user_person_info i_u_p_i ON e_p_i.user_per_id = i_u_p_i.user_per_id
WHERE e_p_i.pro_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key},'%')

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply , i_u_p_i.user_per_id AS i_user_per_id, i_u_p_i.user_id, i_u_p_i.grade_id, i_u_p_i.per_card_no, i_u_p_i.per_sex, i_u_p_i.per_post, i_u_p_i.per_politics_type, i_u_p_i.per_stu_no, i_u_p_i.per_class_no, i_u_p_i.per_corm_no, i_u_p_i.per_native, i_u_p_i.per_qq, i_u_p_i.per_school_post, i_u_p_i.per_school_honor, i_u_p_i.per_social_practice, i_u_p_i.per_working, i_u_p_i.per_born, i_u_p_i.per_interest, i_u_p_i.per_employ FROM ent_project_info e_p_i LEFT JOIN ent_user_person_info i_u_p_i ON e_p_i.user_per_id = i_u_p_i.user_per_id WHERE e_p_i.pro_info_id = #{id}

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply , e_e_i.ent_info_id, e_e_i.user_id , e_e_i.ent_name , e_e_i.ent_corporate , e_e_i.ent_business , e_e_i.ent_code, e_e_i.ent_register, e_e_i.ent_founding_time, e_e_i.ent_type, e_e_i.ent_status ,e_e_i.ent_register_address , e_e_i.ent_address ,e_e_i.ent_introduce, e_e_i.new_high_zones, e_e_i.ent_logo, e_e_i.ent_in_time, e_e_i.in_apply AS e_in_apply FROM ent_project_info e_p_i LEFT JOIN ent_enterprise_info e_e_i ON e_p_i.ent_info_id = e_e_i.ent_info_id
WHERE e_p_i.pro_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key},'%')

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply , e_e_i.ent_info_id, e_e_i.user_id , e_e_i.ent_name , e_e_i.ent_corporate , e_e_i.ent_business , e_e_i.ent_code, e_e_i.ent_register, e_e_i.ent_founding_time, e_e_i.ent_type, e_e_i.ent_status ,e_e_i.ent_register_address , e_e_i.ent_address ,e_e_i.ent_introduce, e_e_i.new_high_zones, e_e_i.ent_logo, e_e_i.ent_in_time, e_e_i.in_apply AS e_in_apply FROM ent_project_info e_p_i LEFT JOIN ent_enterprise_info e_e_i ON e_p_i.ent_info_id = e_e_i.ent_info_id WHERE e_p_i.pro_info_id = #{id}

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply , i_u_t_i.user_teacher_id AS i_user_teacher_id, i_u_t_i.user_id, i_u_t_i.teacher_card_no, i_u_t_i.teacher_sex, i_u_t_i.teacher_post, i_u_t_i.teacher_title, i_u_t_i.teacher_background, i_u_t_i.teacher_degree, i_u_t_i.teacher_study, i_u_t_i.teacher_scientific FROM ent_project_info e_p_i LEFT JOIN ent_user_teacher_info i_u_t_i ON e_p_i.user_teacher_id = i_u_t_i.user_teacher_id
WHERE e_p_i.pro_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key},'%')

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply , i_u_t_i.user_teacher_id AS i_user_teacher_id, i_u_t_i.user_id, i_u_t_i.teacher_card_no, i_u_t_i.teacher_sex, i_u_t_i.teacher_post, i_u_t_i.teacher_title, i_u_t_i.teacher_background, i_u_t_i.teacher_degree, i_u_t_i.teacher_study, i_u_t_i.teacher_scientific FROM ent_project_info e_p_i LEFT JOIN ent_user_teacher_info i_u_t_i ON e_p_i.user_teacher_id = i_u_t_i.user_teacher_id WHERE e_p_i.pro_info_id = #{id}

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply FROM ent_project_info e_p_i WHERE e_p_i.user_per_id = #{userPerId}

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply FROM ent_project_info e_p_i WHERE e_p_i.user_teacher_id = #{userTeacherId}

SELECT e_p_i.pro_info_id, e_p_i.pro_name , e_p_i.pro_register , e_p_i.pro_origin , e_p_i.pro_outlay , e_p_i.pro_type, e_p_i.pro_introduce, e_p_i.ent_info_id, e_p_i.user_per_id, e_p_i.user_teacher_id ,e_p_i.in_apply FROM ent_project_info e_p_i WHERE e_p_i.ent_info_id = #{entInfoId}
